hero.description: Educational kits that make learning fun, interactive, and meaningful. Perfect for children who love to build, create, and explore.

benefits.title: Why ZerekLab?
benefits.description: We strive to provide the best educational experience for young minds through innovative kits.

creativity.title: Ignite Creativity
creativity.description: Spark your child's imagination through hands-on learning that brings ideas to life.

future.title: Future-Ready
future.description: Prepare children for tomorrow's world with cutting-edge technology and STEM education.

learning.title: Learn by Doing
learning.description: Interactive kits that make complex concepts simple and engaging to understand.

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: Comprehensive guides and support to ensure successful learning outcomes.

categories.title: Our Categories
categories.description: From electronics to robotics — find the perfect kit for every young innovator.

electronics.title: Electronics
electronics.description: Explore circuits, sensors, and electronic components

robotics.title: Robotics
robotics.description: Build and program your own robots

programming.title: Programming
programming.description: Code your way to amazing projects

testimonials.title: Parent & Educator Reviews
testimonials.description: Join thousands of families who trust ZerekLab for quality educational experiences.

testimonial1.name: Aigerim S.
testimonial1.content: My daughter is thrilled with the robotics kit! She learned so much about programming and engineering.

testimonial2.name: Michael I.
testimonial2.content: These kits have revolutionized my approach to teaching STEM. Students are more engaged than ever!

testimonial3.name: Elena P.
testimonial3.content: Perfect balance of fun and learning. My son has created amazing projects with these kits.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your STEM Adventure?
cta.description: Choose the perfect kit for your child and open the door to a world of engaging learning and endless possibilities.

about.title: About ZerekLab
about.subtitle: Inspiring the next generation of innovators and creators through hands-on learning.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At ZerekLab, our mission is to make STEM education accessible, engaging, and fun for children around the world. We believe that hands-on experience is key to unlocking a child's potential and fostering a lifelong love of learning and discovery.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a world where every child has the opportunity to explore their curiosity, develop critical thinking skills, and become confident problem solvers. Our educational kits are designed to be the spark that ignites this journey.

passion.title: Passion for Education
passion.description: We are driven by a deep passion for education and a commitment to providing high-quality learning tools.

childFocused.title: Child-Centered Design
childFocused.description: Our kits are carefully designed to be engaging, age-appropriate, and safe for young learners.

innovative.title: Innovative Learning
innovative.description: We constantly innovate to bring the latest STEM concepts to life through interactive and exciting projects.

quality.title: Quality and Safety
quality.description: All our products undergo rigorous quality control and are made from safe, durable materials.

skills.title: Skill Development
skills.description: Our kits promote the development of critical thinking, problem-solving, and creative abilities.

inspiration.title: Inspiration for the Future
inspiration.description: We strive to inspire children to explore science and technology, opening new horizons for them.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: ZerekLab was founded by a group of enthusiasts – educators and engineers who recognized the need for better tools to teach children STEM fundamentals. Frustrated by the lack of engaging and accessible options, we decided to create our own. What started as a small project grew into a company dedicated to empowering young minds.
story.paragraph2: Our journey is fueled by the joy we see in children when they build, experiment, and learn with our kits. We are proud to be part of their educational adventure and strive to make learning not only beneficial but truly exciting.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, feedback, or just want to say hello.

footer.description: Inspiring children through hands-on educational kits. Creating the future generation of innovators and inventors.
